comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.112 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Building Firefox-5.0 on AIX5.3 with 64bit pre-requisite rpms. 


Actual results:

Build fails with the below error :


"../../dist/include/mozilla/mozalloc.h", line 227.7: 1540-0400 (S) "operator new(size_t)" has a conflicting declaration.
"/usr/vacpp/include/new", line 99.10: 1540-0424 (I) "operator new" is declared on line 99 of "/usr/vacpp/include/new".
"../../dist/include/mozilla/mozalloc.h", line 239.7: 1540-0400 (S) "operator new[](size_t)" has a conflicting declaration.
"/usr/vacpp/include/new", line 103.10: 1540-0424 (I) "operator new[]" is declared on line 103 of "/usr/vacpp/include/new".
gmake[6]: *** [mozalloc.o] Error 1
gmake[6]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
gmake[6]: Leaving directory `/home/firefox/ashish/firefox-5.0.1.source/mozilla-release/obj-opt/memory/mozalloc'
gmake[5]: *** [libs] Error 2
gmake[5]: Leaving directory `/home/firefox/ashish/firefox-5.0.1.source/mozilla-release/obj-opt/memory'
gmake[4]: *** [libs_tier_base] Error 2



Expected results:

The Build should have completed properly
comments.author: sehgal.himanshu01@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.112 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Building Firefox-5.0 on AIX5.3 with 64bit pre-requisite rpms. 


Actual results:

Build fails with the below error :


"../../dist/include/mozilla/mozalloc.h", line 227.7: 1540-0400 (S) "operator new(size_t)" has a conflicting declaration.
"/usr/vacpp/include/new", line 99.10: 1540-0424 (I) "operator new" is declared on line 99 of "/usr/vacpp/include/new".
"../../dist/include/mozilla/mozalloc.h", line 239.7: 1540-0400 (S) "operator new[](size_t)" has a conflicting declaration.
"/usr/vacpp/include/new", line 103.10: 1540-0424 (I) "operator new[]" is declared on line 103 of "/usr/vacpp/include/new".
gmake[6]: *** [mozalloc.o] Error 1
gmake[6]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
gmake[6]: Leaving directory `/home/firefox/ashish/firefox-5.0.1.source/mozilla-release/obj-opt/memory/mozalloc'
gmake[5]: *** [libs] Error 2
gmake[5]: Leaving directory `/home/firefox/ashish/firefox-5.0.1.source/mozilla-release/obj-opt/memory'
gmake[4]: *** [libs_tier_base] Error 2



Expected results:

The Build should have completed properly
comments.creator: sehgal.himanshu01@gmail.com

comments.text:
Have to explicitly enable cpp exceptions in the .mozconfig file " ac_add_options --enable-cpp-exceptions " without which it would be disabled and the definition of operator new would be taken as 

void* operator new(size_t size) throw()

instead of 

void* operator new(size_t size) throw(std::bad_alloc)
comments.raw_text:
Have to explicitly enable cpp exceptions in the .mozconfig file " ac_add_options --enable-cpp-exceptions " without which it would be disabled and the definition of operator new would be taken as 

void* operator new(size_t size) throw()

instead of 

void* operator new(size_t size) throw(std::bad_alloc)
comments.author: sehgal.himanshu01@gmail.com
